wiki.text:
'Description' is one of four rhetorical modes (also known as modes of
discourse), along with exposition, argumentation, and narration. Each of the
rhetorical modes is present in a variety of forms and each has its own purpose
and conventions. The act of description may be related to that of definition.
Description is also the fiction-writing mode for transmitting a mental image of
the particulars of a story.
wiki.title: Description
